entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 01:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9 except low minus 12 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9 except low minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening then northeast 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
